markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rejuvenating Touch](/Feats.aspx?ID=1693) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Blessed One](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=51) (Level 20)

**Prerequisites**
devotion spell ([_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=395))

</column>

---

Your healing energies linger after you cast, providing continual benefits. An ally that recovers Hit Points from your [_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=395) gains 10 temporary Hit Points at the start of their turn during each of the next 10 rounds. This effect ends if the ally is knocked [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38).
name: Rejuvenating Touch
